Summary
Unique 23 years experience combination from polymer chemistry
- trough quality controll -polyolefines technologies up to the plastic
processing at plastic (mainly PP, HDPE, LDPE) converters. I was
responsible for ex TVK's (now MOL Petrochemicals) Lyondellbasell

units and also developed lot of grades based on customer request
and demand. I have long term and good relationship in technical
field with Lyondellbasell, Mitsui, Idemitsu and lot of plastic additive
producers, customers in CEE, Germany and Italy.
